meanings.definition: A place where two roads meet and diverge.
meanings.sent1: At the bivium, we must choose which path to take.
meanings.sent2: The bivium ahead forced us to decide our route.
meanings.sent3: I never thought a simple bivium could cause such a dilemma!
meanings.sent4: Life is like a bivium, where decisions shape our journey.
meanings.sent5: The bivium was a clear point of decision in the road.

meanings.sent1: We reached a bivium and had to pick a direction.
meanings.sent2: The bivium in the forest confused us on which way to go.
meanings.sent3: I never expected a bivium to make me feel lost!
meanings.sent4: The bivium loomed ahead, symbolizing a choice in our path.
meanings.sent5: The bivium was a crucial point where our journey split.
